name: LossFunction-DL2
run: vehicle compile -s spec.vcl -t LossFunction -o LossFunction-DL2.json --network f:NO_FILE --network g:NO_FILE

name: LossFunction-Godel

name: LossFunction-Lukasiewicz

name: LossFunction-Yager
run: vehicle compile -s spec.vcl -t LossFunction-Yager -o LossFunction-Yager.json --network f:NO_FILE --network g:NO_FILE

name: LossFunction-Product
run: vehicle compile -s spec.vcl -t LossFunction-Product -o LossFunction-Product.json --network f:NO_FILE --network g:NO_FILE
